threat: A local attacker with physical access could insert a specially crafted USB device and gain root privileges.
If the net.sctp.addip_enable variable was turned on, a remote attacker could send specially crafted traffic to crash the system.
A local attacker could exploit this to read certain information, leading to a loss of privacy.
A local attacker could exploit this to read certain information, leading to a loss of privacy.
An attacker could use this flaw to possibly predict sequence numbers and inject packets.

all the necessary changes.
